crypto.name: ForgeMe 1
crypto.desc:
Author: Gary#4657
Can you break my hashed-based MAC? Below are some resources that may be useful.
Resources:
SHA1 RFC
Length Extension Attack

crypto.name: ForgeMe 2
crypto.desc:
Author: Gary#4657
Can you break my hashed-based MAC again? Below are some resources that may be useful.
Resources:
SHA1 RFC
Length Extension Attack

crypto.name: RSA Intro
crypto.desc:
Author: @Gary#4657
What is RSA? Really Spicy Applesauce? Ridiculously Smart Alpaca? Random Squirrel Alliance?
Nope, not at all. Just some dudes who made a cool public-key cryptosystem!

crypto.name: RSA Outro
crypto.desc:
Author: @Gary#4657
I didn't feel like fitting this one in the RSA Intro, so here is an RSA Outro!

crypto.name: Signed Jeopardy
crypto.desc:
Author: @awesome10billion#1164 (CTFd)
Let's play a special form of Jeopardy involving ECDSA!

mobile.name: Fortune Teller
mobile.desc:
Author: @matlac#2291
Can you guess what fortune the fortune teller is thinking of?

mobile.name: JNInjaspeak
mobile.desc:
Author: @matlac#2291
We are all very familiar with Leetspeak, can you crack the code on how JNInjaspeak works?

mobile.name: Nahamstagram
mobile.desc:
Author: @matlac#2291
NahamCon now has it's own secure moblie app! Can you see if it's truly secure?

mobile.name: Red Light Green Light
mobile.desc:
Author: @matlac#2291
You are stuck in a game of red light green light, to win you need to press the button when the light is green. Wait all you want, the light has never changed to green for me :(

pwn.name: All Patched Up
pwn.desc:
Author: @M_alpha#3534
Do you really know how to ret2libc?

pwn.name: Limitations
pwn.desc:
Author: @WittsEnd2#9274
I am trying to run a program, but I am super restricted ...

pwn.name: Nahm Nahm Nahm
pwn.desc:
Author: @WittsEnd
Me hungry for files!
For your convenience, pwntools, nano and vim are installed on this instance.

pwn.name: Oboe
pwn.desc:
Author: @congon4tor#2334
Fun fact, my favorite instrument is the OBOe! Oh, and I made this cool C program to create URLs. Isn't it cool? Anyway, I'm going to go back to playing the oboe!

pwn.name: Open Sesame
pwn.desc:
Author: @JohnHammond#6971
Something about forty thieves or something? I don't know, they must have had some secret incantation to get the gold!

pwn.name: Web Application Firewall
pwn.desc:
Author: @M_alpha#3534
Well, maybe a different kind of WAF...

pwn.name: Weird Cookie
pwn.desc:
Author: @M_alpha#3534
Something's a little off about this stack cookie...

rev.name: Mayhem
rev.desc:
Author: @M_alpha#3534
The SOC team noticed a system periodically beaconing to a suspicious IP address. A snapshot of the suspicious process' memory was taken but the IR team wants to know what exactly is going on with this system.

rev.name: The Sandbox
rev.desc:
Author: @WittsEnd2#9274
We lost our password in the sandbox, and now we need help trying to find it. Can you get it for us?

rev.name: ur a wizard
rev.desc:
Author: BusesCanFly
Hocus Pocus, Abbacadabbra, this program is.. not interesting!

rev.name: writeright
rev.desc:
Author: @BusesCanFly
Right, right? right? or left right? whatever.

web.name: Transfer
web.desc:
Author: @JohnHammond#6971
Inspired by current events! :D
Escalate your privileges and find the flag.
